DataElement.preferredName: Patient Smartphone Application Internet Access Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indication of whether a patient has  a smartphone device with access to the internet that meets the criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Smartphone Application Internet Access Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An application designed specifically for use on a smartphone._A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services._The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Smartphone Application Internet Access Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An application designed specifically for use on a smartphone.:A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services.:The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An application designed specifically for use on a smartphone.
A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services.
The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have access to a smart phone or device with an Apple or Android operating system that can be used to access the TENS device's App and ability to connect to the internet on a daily basis during the trial.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: does the patient have a smartphone or device that is wifi/data enabled?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/19/2022: fixed the box symbol in PQT.wz
